offMenu.label: Hide Navigator
offMenu.helpText: A page that is in the flow of the form but not displayed in the menu

pageOfNoReturn.label: Page of no return
pageOfNoReturn.helpText: The user will not be able to navigate back past this page

fullPage.label: Full Page
fullPage.helpText: Page spans full width and height of browser window

menuText.label: Menu Text
menuText.helpText: This Text will be used in the Navigator Menu instead of Page label

ruleTemplates.name: Page load
ruleTemplates.msg: a script to run when this page is loaded within a navigator context.  Use the info parameter to access the id of the page navigated to and from.

ruleTemplates.name: Page load scroll
ruleTemplates.msg: a script to run when this page is loaded, this will override the default scroll and focus functionality for this page.
